input_text:
Job Title: Project/Program Manager II

Location: Seattle, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Compensation Range:

$45.00 - $53.00

Welcome to IntePros, a certified woman-owned company specializing in innovative and results-oriented recruiting and staffing solutions. We take immense pride in genuinely understanding what drives and inspires exceptional individuals like you. Your success is our priority, and we are dedicated to actively shaping your long-term career journey. At IntePros, we believe in comprehensive well-being. You have access to our medical, dental, vision, and mental health programs, ensuring your health and wellness are taken care of. To support your continuous growth, we also provide a $1,500 per year education and professional certification fund. Diversity and inclusion are cornerstones of our company ethos. IntePros is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate in employment on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, disability, age, veteran or military status, retaliation, or any other characteristic protected by law. We celebrate the rich tapestry of backgrounds and perspectives that make us stronger as a team. Please note that only qualified individuals being considered will be contacted. We appreciate your interest and look forward to potentially embarking on a transformative journey together.

Project Manager II

IntePros is looking for a Project Manager to work 100% remotely for our Premier Client located in Seattle, WA. This is an exciting role that will work directly on a reverse logistics team on limited warranty policies and procurement purchasing.

Responsibilities:

Following and participating in customer experience case management. Action end to end case management processing of inbound requests from intake tickets that involves solving replacement issues for warranty support and lead right to repair request. Provide program support through pulling and reporting KPI’s for internal reviews. 


What are the top three MUST HAVE skill sets (technical) required?

3+ years of experience working with MS Office in a professional environment. 2+ years of case management experience. 2+ years of research project experience. 


What are the top three PREFERRED skill sets (technical)?

Root cause analysis experience Procurement/purchasing end-to-end experience. 


Soft Skill requirements (team fit/personality requirements)

Excellent communication skills Punctuality in meeting deadlines Ability to learn quickly and thrive in a very collaborative environment.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Project/Program Manager II
output_json.summary: Remote Project Manager role at IntePros for a Premier Client in Seattle, WA.

Solving replacement issues for warranty support and lead right to repair request
Providing program support through pulling and reporting KPI’s for internal reviews
